utsuhoReiuji:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
utsuhoReiuji:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

utsuhoReiuji:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
utsuhoReiuji:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
utsuhoReiuji:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

utsuhoReiuji:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
utsuhoReiuji:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

utsuhoReiuji:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
utsuhoReiuji:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !utsuhoReiuji:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

utsuhoReiuji:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
utsuhoReiuji:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !utsuhoReiuji:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
